Scripts.OnLoad: if ( self:IsEnabled() ~= 1 ) then local name = self:GetName() _G[name.."Left"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Disabled") _G[name.."Middle"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Disabled") _G[name.."Right"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Disabled") end
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if ( self:IsEnabled() == 1 ) then local name = self:GetName() _G[name.."Left"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Down") _G[name.."Middle"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Down") _G[name.."Right"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Down") end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if ( self:IsEnabled() == 1 ) then local name = self:GetName() _G[name.."Left"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Up") _G[name.."Middle"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Up") _G[name.."Right"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Up") end
Scripts.OnShow: if ( self:IsEnabled() == 1 ) then -- we need to reset our textures just in case we were hidden before a mouse up fired local name = self:GetName() _G[name.."Left"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Up") _G[name.."Middle"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Up") _G[name.."Right"]:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Panel-Button-Up") end
Scripts.OnEnter: if(self.tooltipText ~= nil) then GameTooltip_AddNewbieTip(self, self.tooltipText, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, self.newbieText) end
if(self.tooltipText ~= nil) then GameTooltip_AddNewbieTip(self, self.tooltipText, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, self.newbieText) end

Scripts.OnLoad:
self.InsetBorderTopLeft:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderTopLeft:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.IBackground, 0, 0)
self.InsetBorderTopRight:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderTopRight:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", self.IBackground, 0, 0)
self.InsetBorderBottomLeft:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderBottomLeft:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.IBackground, 0, -1)
self.InsetBorderBottomRight:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderBottomRight:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.IBackground, 0, -1)
self.InsetBorderTop:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderTop:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "TOPRIGHT", 0, 0) self.InsetBorderTop:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", self.InsetBorderTopRight, "TOPLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetBorderBottom:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderBottom:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.InsetBorderBottomLeft, "BOTTOMRIGHT", 0, 0) self.InsetBorderBottom:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetBorderLeft:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderLeft:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0) self.InsetBorderLeft:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.InsetBorderBottomLeft, "TOPLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetBorderRight:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderRight:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", self.InsetBorderTopRight, "BOTTOMRIGHT", 0, 0) self.InsetBorderRight:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "TOPRIGHT", 0, 0)

self.InsetTopLeftCorner:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetTopLeftCorner:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetTopRightCorner:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetTopRightCorner:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", 0, 0)
self.InsetBotLeftCorner:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBotLeftCorner:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetBotRightCorner:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBotRightCorner:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", 0, 0)
self.InsetTopBorder:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetTopBorder:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetTopLeftCorner, "TOPRIGHT", 0, 0) self.InsetTopBorder:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", self.InsetTopRightCorner, "TOPLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetBottomBorder:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBottomBorder:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.InsetBotLeftCorner, "BOTTOMRIGHT", 0, 0) self.InsetBottomBorder:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.InsetBotRightCorner, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetLeftBorder:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetLeftBorder:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetTopLeftCorner, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0) self.InsetLeftBorder:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.InsetBotLeftCorner, "TOPLEFT", 0, 0)
self.InsetRightBorder:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetRightBorder:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", self.InsetTopRightCorner, "BOTTOMRIGHT", 0, 0) self.InsetRightBorder:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.InsetBotRightCorner, "TOPRIGHT", 0, 0)

self.InsetBorderRightMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderRightMiddle:SetPoint("TOP", self.InsetBorderTopRight, "BOTTOM") self.InsetBorderRightMiddle:SetPoint("BOTTOM", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "TOP")
self.InsetBorderLeftMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderLeftMiddle:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "BOTTOMLEFT") self.InsetBorderLeftMiddle:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.InsetBorderBottomLeft, "TOPLEFT")
self.InsetBorderTopMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderTopMiddle:SetPoint("RIGHT", self.InsetBorderTopRight, "LEFT") self.InsetBorderTopMiddle:SetPoint("LEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "RIGHT")
self.InsetBorderBottomMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderBottomMiddle:SetPoint("RIGHT", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "LEFT") self.InsetBorderBottomMiddle:SetPoint("LEFT", self.InsetBorderBottomLeft, "RIGHT")
self.InsetBg:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBg:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "BOTTOMRIGHT") self.InsetBg:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "TOPLEFT")

self.InsetBorderRightMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderRightMiddle:SetPoint("TOP", self.InsetBorderTopRight, "BOTTOM") self.InsetBorderRightMiddle:SetPoint("BOTTOM", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "TOP")
self.InsetBorderLeftMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderLeftMiddle:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "BOTTOMLEFT") self.InsetBorderLeftMiddle:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self.InsetBorderBottomLeft, "TOPLEFT")
self.InsetBorderTopMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderTopMiddle:SetPoint("RIGHT", self.InsetBorderTopRight, "LEFT") self.InsetBorderTopMiddle:SetPoint("LEFT", self.InsetBorderTopLeft, "RIGHT")
self.InsetBorderBottomMiddle:ClearAllPoints() self.InsetBorderBottomMiddle:SetPoint("RIGHT", self.InsetBorderBottomRight, "LEFT") self.InsetBorderBottomMiddle:SetPoint("LEFT", self.InsetBorderBottomLeft, "RIGHT")

Scripts.OnClick: local parent = self:GetParent() local scrollStep = self:GetParent().scrollStep or (parent:GetHeight() / 2) parent:SetValue(parent:GetValue() - scrollStep) PlaySound("UChatScrollButton")
local parent = self:GetParent() local scrollStep = self:GetParent().scrollStep or (parent:GetHeight() / 2) parent:SetValue(parent:GetValue() + scrollStep) PlaySound("UChatScrollButton")

Scripts.OnVerticalScroll: local scrollbar = _G[self:GetName().."ScrollBar"] scrollbar:SetValue(offset) local min local max min, max = scrollbar:GetMinMaxValues() if ( offset == 0 ) then _G[scrollbar:GetName().."ScrollUpButton"]:Disable() else _G[scrollbar:GetName().."ScrollUpButton"]:Enable() end if ((scrollbar:GetValue() - max) == 0) then _G[scrollbar:GetName().."ScrollDownButton"]:Disable() else _G[scrollbar:GetName().."ScrollDownButton"]:Enable() end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self:IsEnabled() then self.texture:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self, "TOPLEFT", 1, -1) end

if self:IsEnabled() ~= 0 then self.TopLeft:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Down") self.TopRight:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Down") self.BottomLeft:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Down") self.BottomRight:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Down") self.TopMiddle:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Down") self.MiddleLeft:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Down") self.MiddleRight:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Down") self.BottomMiddle:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Down") self.MiddleMiddle:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Down") if ( self.Icon ) then if ( not self.Icon.oldPoint ) then local point, relativeTo, relativePoint, x, y = self.Icon:GetPoint(1) self.Icon.oldPoint = point self.Icon.oldX = x self.Icon.oldY = y end self.Icon:SetPoint(self.Icon.oldPoint, self.Icon.oldX + 1, self.Icon.oldY - 1) end end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if self:IsEnabled() ~= 0 then self.TopLeft:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.TopRight:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.BottomLeft:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.BottomRight:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.TopMiddle:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.MiddleLeft:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.MiddleRight:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.BottomMiddle:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.MiddleMiddle:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") if ( self.Icon ) then self.Icon:SetPoint(self.Icon.oldPoint, self.Icon.oldX, self.Icon.oldY) end end
Scripts.OnShow: if self:IsEnabled() ~= 0 then -- we need to reset our textures just in case we were hidden before a mouse up fired self.TopLeft:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.TopRight:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.BottomLeft:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.BottomRight:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.TopMiddle:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.MiddleLeft:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.MiddleRight:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.BottomMiddle:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") self.MiddleMiddle:SetTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-Silver-Button-Up") end
Scripts.OnEnter: if(self.tooltipText ~= nil) then GameTooltip_AddNewbieTip(self, self.tooltipText, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, self.newbieText) end

Scripts.OnClick: if HideParentPanel then HideParentPanel(self); printc("HideParentPanel") else self:GetParent():Hide() printc("Hide") end

Scripts.OnLoad:
self.Top:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopLeft, "TOPRIGHT") self.Top:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.TopRight, "BOTTOMLEFT")
self.Bottom:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.BottomLeft, "TOPRIGHT") self.Bottom:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.BottomRight, "BOTTOMLEFT")
self.Left:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopLeft, "BOTTOMLEFT") self.Left:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.BottomLeft, "TOPRIGHT")
self.Right:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopRight, "BOTTOMLEFT") self.Right:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.BottomRight, "TOPRIGHT")
self.Top:SetVertexColor( 1, 0.82, 0 ) self.Bottom:SetVertexColor( 1, 0.82, 0 ) self.Left:SetVertexColor( 1, 0.82, 0 ) self.Right:SetVertexColor( 1, 0.82, 0 ) self.TopLeft:SetVertexColor( 1, 0.82, 0 ) self.TopRight:SetVertexColor( 1, 0.82, 0 ) self.BottomLeft:SetVertexColor( 1, 0.82, 0 ) self.BottomRight:SetVertexColor( 1, 0.82, 0 )

self.Top:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopLeft, "TOPRIGHT") self.Top:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.TopRight, "BOTTOMLEFT")
self.Bottom:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.BottomLeft, "TOPRIGHT") self.Bottom:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.BottomRight, "BOTTOMLEFT")
self.Left:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopLeft, "BOTTOMLEFT") self.Left:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.BottomLeft, "TOPRIGHT")
self.Right:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.TopRight, "BOTTOMLEFT") self.Right:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.BottomRight, "TOPRIGHT")
if InGlue() then self:SetParent("GlueParent") else self:SetParent("UIParent") end

Scripts.OnClick:
self:GetParent():Hide();
if self:GetParent().OnCloseFunc then self:GetParent().OnCloseFunc() end

Scripts.OnLoad:
self.Middle:ClearAllPoints() self.Middle:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.Top, "BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0) self.Middle:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.Bottom, "TOPRIGHT", 0, 0)
self.Background:ClearAllPoints() self.Background:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self.Top, 2, 0) self.Background:SetPoint("BOTTOMRIGHT", self.Bottom, 0, 0)

Scripts.OnMouseWheel: if self:GetParent():IsEnabled() then local amount = IsShiftKeyDown() and 10 or 1; if delta > 0 then NumericInputSpinner_Increment(self:GetParent(), amount) else NumericInputSpinner_Decrement(self:GetParent(), amount) end self:GetParent():ClearFocus(); end

Scripts.OnUpdate: if self.showRetrievingText then LoadingSpinnerRetrieving_OnUpdate(self, elapsed) end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: local point, relativeTo, relativePoint, x, y = self.Icon:GetPoint() self.origX = x self.origY = y self.Icon:SetPoint(point, relativeTo, relativePoint, x-1, y-1)
Scripts.OnMouseUp: local point, relativeTo, relativePoint = self.Icon:GetPoint() self.Icon:SetPoint(point, relativeTo, relativePoint, self.origX, self.origY)
Scripts.OnHide: local point, relativeTo, relativePoint = self.Icon:GetPoint() self.Icon:SetPoint(point, relativeTo, relativePoint, self.origX, self.origY)
Scripts.OnEnter: if (self.tooltip) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_CURSOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.tooltip, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b) end
